content: As I continue to deal with the remains of “that thing” that happened to my life last year, I have found myself without a “job” at times, even quit a few, but there is always “work.” The harvest is ripe, but the laborers are too few. I think we need to uncondition our minds to lending our bodies to slavery. If you took the time, you could find a “living” within yourself. Create. . . And be happy.
